location: Estrada Courts.Hunter St., Los Angeles, CA 9023.
description: Ernesto de la Loza was the lead artist. Assisted by local youth. The first mural painted at Estrada Courts in ten years, it portrays (from left to right) Cesar Chavez, Emiliano Zapata, Pancho Villa, and the Spanish comic actor (who had just died) Cantinflas.
